column4: Hey has any one been able to use banshee 1.2.1 with the IPOD 5th gen?
As far as I know, 5th gen iPod doesn't have Linux support. Apple is doing all it can to make its products work only with iTunes.
no this is the Ipod with video it works well with amarok
Cool. I guess 5th gen must be supported now, then. If you're looking for people more familiar with Banshee, try joining irc.gnome.org/banshee
